title: Sweet and spicy BBQ sauce
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons butter', '1 small onion, minced', '1 clove garlic, minced', '3 tablespoons red wine vinegar', '250ml chilli sauce', '250ml pineapple juice', '125g crushed pineapple', '4 tablespoons dark brown soft sugar', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', '2 tablespoons Worcestershire sauce', '2 teaspoons mustard powder', '1 pinch pepper', '2 tablespoons hot pepper sauce', '1 habanero or Scotch bonnet chilli, seeded and chopped', '125ml whisky']
